data.RemoveConditions: not HasActionResource('ReactionActionPoint', 1, 0, false, context.Source) or IsAttack()

data.Boosts: Disadvantage(Ability, Dexterity);Disadvantage(SavingThrow, Dexterity);Disadvantage(SavingThrow, Intelligence);Disadvantage(SavingThrow, Wisdom);Disadvantage(SavingThrow, Charisma);
Advantage(Ability, Strength); Advantage(Ability, Dexterity); Advantage(Ability, Constitution); WeaponDamageResistance(Bludgeoning);WeaponDamageResistance(Slashing);WeaponDamageResistance(Piercing);

data.RemoveConditions: (SavingThrow(Ability.Wisdom, 11) and Tagged('ACT1_DEN_CHARMEDKID') and Combat()) or (SavingThrow(Ability.Wisdom, 11,AdvantageOnCharmed()) and not Tagged('ACT1_DEN_CHARMEDKID'))

data.AuraStatuses: TARGET:IF(Character() and Tagged('HUMANOID') and not Tagged('HARPY') and not Dead() and Enemy()):ApplyStatus(LURING_SONG_AURA_VICTIM,100,1);TARGET:IF(Character() and Tagged('HARPY') and not Dead()):ApplyStatus(LURING_SONG_AURA_LISTENER,100,1);

data.RemoveConditions: IsMiss() and not HasStatus('MIRROR_IMAGE_1', context.Source) and not HasStatus('MIRROR_IMAGE_2', context.Source)

data.Boosts: Resistance(Acid, Resistant); Resistance(Cold, Resistant); Resistance(Fire, Resistant); Resistance(Lightning, Resistant); Resistance(Thunder, Resistant)

IF(Tagged('ABERRATION', context.Source) or Tagged('CELESTIAL', context.Source) or Tagged('ELEMENTAL', context.Source) or Tagged('FEY', context.Source) or Tagged('FIEND', context.Source) or Tagged('UNDEAD', context.Source)):Disadvantage(AttackTarget);StatusImmunity(SG_Possessed)

Advantage(Ability, Strength); Advantage(SavingThrow, Strength); Resistance(Slashing, Resistant); Resistance(Piercing, Resistant); Resistance(Bludgeoning, Resistant); BlockSpellCast(); UnlockSpell(Shout_EndRage); UnlockSpell(Target_FrenziedStrike)

data.AuraStatuses: TARGET:IF(Ally() and not Dead() and Tagged('GNOLL') and not Tagged('GNOLL_FLIND')):ApplyStatus(GNOLL_AURABLOODTHIRST)
TARGET:IF(Character() and not Dead() and not Tagged('CONSTRUCT')):ApplyStatus(STATIC_DISCHARGE);TARGET:IF(Character() and not Dead() and Tagged('CONSTRUCT')):ApplyStatus(STATIC_DISCHARGE_CONSTRUCT)

data.OnApplyFunctors: IF(not WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', false, false, context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(MainHand,OIL_OF_SHARPNESS_MELEE,100,100);IF(WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', false, false, context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(MainHand,OIL_OF_SHARPNESS_RANGED,100,100);IF(not WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', false, false, context.Source)):ApplyStatus(OIL_OF_SHARPNESS_MELEE,100,100);IF(WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', false, false, context.Source)):ApplyStatus(OIL_OF_SHARPNESS_RANGED,100,100);

data.Boosts: Resistance(Acid, Resistant); Resistance(Cold, Resistant); Resistance(Fire, Resistant); Resistance(Lightning, Resistant); Resistance(Thunder, Resistant); Resistance(Force, Resistant); Resistance(Psychic, Resistant); Resistance(Necrotic, Resistant); Resistance(Radiant, Resistant); Resistance(Slashing, Resistant);  Resistance(Piercing, Resistant); Resistance(Bludgeoning, Resistant)
